I'm sorry to hear about your comp. It there anyway to fix or get rid 
of the virus?  I don't know anything about viruses so I got to ask, 
can we get the computer virus through you sending messages to this 
egroup server?  I don't want a virus on my comp either. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Okay, before I go any further I just want to know that I'm not 
> accusing anyone. I just need to know stuff. Just now, I found out 
> that my e-mail adress has been hacked. Someone went in, and sent a 
> message from me, to me. I was from minime_316, to minime_316. When 
I 
> opened it, a virus came and now my screen is flooded with bright 
> yellow ducks. This is no joke. If anyone knows anything about this, 
> and remember I'm not accusing you, please send me a private e-mail 
to 
> mjs@c... Thank you
